EditorsChoice.quote: The wounds you are not seeing, are the most difficult to heal
EditorsChoice.author: Astrid Alauda

EditorsChoice.quote: Most people die at 25 and aren’t buried until they’re 75.
EditorsChoice.author: Benjamin Franklin

EditorsChoice.quote: The day you stop racing, is the day you win the race.
EditorsChoice.author: Bob Marley

EditorsChoice.quote: I regret nothing in my life except for the things i didn't do
EditorsChoice.author: Coco Chanel

EditorsChoice.quote: Can you remember who you were before the world told you who you have to be?
EditorsChoice.author: Charles Bukowski

AllQuotes.quoteAll: The wounds you are not seeing, are the most difficult to heal
Most people die at 25 and aren’t buried until they’re 75.
Can you remember who you were before the world told you who you have to be?
The day you stop racing, is the day you win the race.
I regret nothing in my life except for the things i didn't do
Maybe there are better times, but this is our time

Astrid Alauda.quotePQ: The wounds you are not seeing, are the most difficult to heal.

Blaise Pascal.quotePQ: A drop of love is more than an ocean of mind

Benjamin Franklin.quotePQ: Most People die at 25 and aren't buried until they are 75.

Bob Marley.quotePQ: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
Open your eyes, and look within. Are you satisfied with the life you're living?
The day you stop racing, is the day you win the race.
Love the life you live. Live the life you love.

Charles Bukowski.quotePQ: Do you remember who you were before the world told you, who you have to be?

Coco Chanel.quotePQ: I regret nothing in my life except for the things i didn't do.
If you were born without wings, do nothing to prevent them from growing.
